publishSolutionButton.publishSolution:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to publish a solution
**UI Location**: Student solution page → Publish button
**When Users See This**: When viewing their solution and wanting to publish it
**Technical Context**: Standard button text
**Current English**: "Publish solution"
miniAdvert.backupYourSolutionsToGitHub:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the GitHub backup advertisement
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer Widget → Mini Advert
**When Users See This**: When the GitHub Syncer widget is displayed, encouraging users to set up backups
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Backup your Solutions to GitHub"
miniAdvert.automaticallyBackupSolutions:
**Functional Purpose**: Descriptive text for the GitHub backup advertisement
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer Widget → Mini Advert
**When Users See This**: When the GitHub Syncer widget is displayed, describing the automatic backup feature
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Automatically backup your solutions to GitHub with our automated backup tool."
miniAdvert.configureBackups:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to configure GitHub backups
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer Widget → Mini Advert
**When Users See This**: When the GitHub Syncer widget is displayed, to navigate to backup settings
**Technical Context**: Button text; links to `settingsLink`
**Current English**: "Configure backups"
activeAutomaticSync.autoBackupEnabled:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading indicating that auto-backup is enabled
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer Widget → Active Automatic Sync
**When Users See This**: When automatic GitHub sync is active for a solution/iteration
**Technical Context**: Standard heading text
**Current English**: "Auto-backup Enabled"
activeAutomaticSync.newIterationsAutoBac:
**Functional Purpose**: Description for automatic backup when sync type is 'solution'
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer Widget → Active Automatic Sync
**When Users See This**: When automatic GitHub sync is active for a solution, explaining its behavior
**Technical Context**: Displays when `sync.type` is 'solution'
**Current English**: "New iterations will automatically backup to GitHub. To manually trigger a backup of all iterations to this solution, please use the button below."

**Functional Purpose**: Description for automatic backup when sync type is 'iteration'
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer Widget → Active Automatic Sync
**When Users See This**: When automatic GitHub sync is active for an iteration, explaining its behavior
**Technical Context**: Displays when `sync.type` is 'iteration'
**Current English**: "New iterations for this solution will automatically backup to GitHub. To manually trigger a backup of this iteration, please use the button below."
activeAutomaticSync.triggerSolutionBacku:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to manually trigger a solution backup
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer Widget → Active Automatic Sync
**When Users See This**: When automatic GitHub sync is active for a solution, allowing manual backup
**Technical Context**: Button text; displays when `sync.type` is 'solution'
**Current English**: "Trigger solution backup"
activeAutomaticSync.triggerIterationBack:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to manually trigger an iteration backup
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer Widget → Active Automatic Sync
**When Users See This**: When automatic GitHub sync is active for an iteration, allowing manual backup
**Technical Context**: Button text; displays when `sync.type` is 'iteration'
**Current English**: "Trigger iteration backup"
